simple paragraph
.
Hello, world!
.
Hello, world!
.

tight list
.
- one
- two
- three
.
- one
- two
- three
.

list with paragraph after
.
- one
- two

Paragraph after.
.
- one
- two

Paragraph after.
.

nested list
.
- one
- two

  - sub
  - sub
.
- one
- two

  - sub
  - sub
.

emphasis
.
_italic_
.
_italic_
.

strong
.
*bold*
.
*bold*
.

simple numbered list - normalized to 1.
.
1. First
2. Second
.
1. First
1. Second
.

nested ordered list - all items normalized
.
1. First

   1. Nested
   2. Items
.
1. First

  1. Nested
  1. Items
.

non-standard numbering gets normalized
.
5. Fifth
6. Sixth
.
1. Fifth
1. Sixth
.

tight ordered list
.
1. one
2. two
3. three
.
1. one
1. two
1. three
.

unchecked task
.
- [ ] Task
.
- [ ] Task
.

checked task
.
- [x] Done
.
- [x] Done
.

mixed tasks
.
- [ ] Todo
- [x] Done
- [ ] Pending
.
- [ ] Todo
- [x] Done
- [ ] Pending
.

task with inline formatting
.
- [ ] Inline _formatting_ *bold*
.
- [ ] Inline _formatting_ *bold*
.

paragraph before list
.
A paragraph.

- item 1
- item 2
.
A paragraph.


- item 1
- item 2
.

heading before paragraph
.
# Heading

A paragraph.
.
# Heading

A paragraph.
.

link with url preserved
.
[click here](https://example.com)
.
[click here](https://example.com)
.

link with emphasis
.
[_formatted_ link](https://example.com)
.
[_formatted_ link](https://example.com)
.
